mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mount Vernon Mansion, west front
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Unknown
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white horizontal image of the Mansion's west front, shot from the bowling green. Note the missing bull's-eye window on the Mansion's pediment. Handwriting on reverse reads: 'Received in Library Feb. 25, 1968 from Lt. Leonard F. Ball ?? (illegible) Agc Assistant currator USAAMC Museum, Washington Area. Letter from Lt. Ball states the photographs were among the papers of General John Glenman'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mansion exterior
